channel.title: Uber n00b
channel.description:
ok lately ive been really interested in scripts, how they work, how to make them etc.
how would i go about making say a simple wood cutter for RS2, just basic and simple

item.title: Uber n00b
item.dc:creator: @Surajd Surajd
item.description:
@Surajd wrote:

Take a look at the Tutorials in the Tutorial section… -.-"

Read full topic

item.title: Uber n00b
item.dc:creator: @Arkanor Arkanor
item.description:
@Arkanor wrote:

Take a look at other people’s scripts and how they set them up. That’s how I learned to script - that and ask a LOT of questions.

Read full topic

item.title: Uber n00b
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

learn the following commands [though they are very detectable]

MoveMouse
FindColor
ClickMouse

and know how to write in a Constant value for a color of the tree, and set up x,y variables.

the top three you can learn no problem i garuntee you.

and the other two you can learn by looking at any script, or just becoming more familiar with the forums.

Read full topic
